nodes.text: Bravo Eight was the callsign given to a pilot in Bravo Flight during the last decades of the Galactic Republic.

Dren Melne served as Bravo Eight prior to the Invasion of Naboo. He was killed in the attack on Station TFP-9 in 33 BBY by his own employers after he failed to deliver fighters. An unidentified N-1 starfighter pilot also flew as Bravo Eight during the Invasion of Naboo one year later.
